atk-abh03a35:2_3: tasmā asañciccāpi tesu vatthūsu vikopitesu ānantariko hotī’’ti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a35:2_9: avasesā pāṇātipātādayopi asañcicca bhaveyyu’’nti codanatthaṁ asañciccapāṇaṁ hantvātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a35:2_13: rogapaṭikārādikāle asañcicca ghātaṁ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a35:2_14: Nanu mātā jīvitā voropitāti pañhepi asañcicca voropitaṁ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādisseva.
atk-abh03a35:2_15: Evaṁ adhippāyaṁ pana aggahetvā hañcīti laddhipatiṭṭhāpanaṁ itarassa.
atk-abh03a35:2_18: Saṅghabhedake pana dhammasaññiṁ sandhāya saṅghabhedo ānantarikoti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a35:2_20: kappaṁ nirayamhi paccatī’’ti vacanaṁ ayoniso gahetvā paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a35:2_21: Puna sabbeti puṭṭho sakapakkhe dhammasaññiṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a35:2_24: Nanu vuttaṁ bhagavatāti suttaṁ ekanteneva dhammavādissa ānantarikabhāvadassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a35:2_26: Itaro pana adhippāyaṁ aggahetvā laddhiṁ patiṭṭhapeti.
atk-abh03a35:5_4: Lokiyaṁ samāpattiñāṇampi hoti dānādivasena pavattaṁ kammassakatañāṇampi;
atk-abh03a35:5_6: Imaṁ pana vibhāgaṁ akatvā ‘‘saccaparicchedakameva ñāṇaṁ na itaraṁ,
atk-abh03a35:5_7: tasmā natthi puthujjanassa ñāṇa’’nti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a35:8_3: natthi nirayapālā nāma sattā’’ti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a35:8_7: Atha naṁ ‘‘yadi tattha nirayapālā na siyuṁ,
atk-abh03a35:8_9: Kāraṇikesu hi sati kāraṇā’’ti codetuṁ natthi nirayesūtiādimāha.
atk-abh03a35:9_1: Yathā hi manussesu sati kāraṇikesu kāraṇā,
atk-abh03a35:9_5: Na vessabhū nopi ca pettirājāti paravādinā sakasamayato suttaṁ ābhataṁ.
atk-abh03a35:9_11: attano kammehi ito paṇunnaṁ paralokaṁ pattaṁ purisaṁ na ete vessabhūādayo hananti.
atk-abh03a35:9_12: Yehi pana so kammehi tattha paṇunno,
atk-abh03a35:9_13: tāni sakāni kammāniyeva naṁ tattha hanantīti kammassakataṁ dīpeti,
atk-abh03a35:12_2: Tattha devesu erāvaṇādayo devaputtā hatthivaṇṇaṁ assavaṇṇaṁ vikubbanti,
atk-abh03a35:12_4: Yesaṁ pana tiracchānavaṇṇino devaputte disvā ‘‘atthi devesu tiracchānagatā’’ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a35:12_9: tiracchānayoniyampi devā siyu’’nti codetuṁ atthi tiracchānagatesūtiādimāha.
atk-abh03a35:12_12: Erāvaṇoti pañhe tassa atthitāya paṭiññā sakavādissa ,
atk-abh03a35:15_2: Tattha yesaṁ ‘‘pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṁ vacīkammaṁ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī’’ti (a. ni.
atk-abh03a35:15_3: 3.431) idañceva suttaṁ sammāvācākammantājīvānañca cittavippayuttataṁ nissāya ‘‘nippariyāyena pañcaṅgikova maggo’’ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a35:15_8: sā ca na maggotiādi parasamayavasena vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a35:15_10: Rūpattā pana maggo na hotīti vaṇṇitā.
atk-abh03a35:15_11: Sammādiṭṭhi maggaṅgantiādi maggaṅgassa amaggatā nāma natthīti dassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a35:15_12: Pubbeva kho panassāti sutte parisuddhasīlassa maggabhāvanā nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a35:15_13: na itarassāti āgamaniyapaṭipadāya visuddhibhāvadassanatthaṁ ‘‘kāyakammaṁ vacīkammaṁ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī’’ti vuttaṁ,
atk-abh03a35:15_15: Tenevāha ‘‘evamassāyaṁ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchatī’’ti.
atk-abh03a35:18_2: Tattha dhammacakkappavattane dvādasākārañāṇaṁ sandhāya ‘‘dvādasavatthukaṁ ñāṇaṁ lokuttara’’nti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a35:18_9: ekekasmiṁ sacce saccañāṇakiccañāṇakatañāṇānaṁ vasena ñāṇanānattaṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a35:18_11: Nanu vuttaṁ bhagavatāti suttaṁ saddhiṁ pubbabhāgaparabhāgehi ñāṇanānattaṁ dīpeti,
